claim: The Portuguese Empire was one of the shortest-lived empires in world history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Portuguese Empire  (  Império Português  )  , also known as the Portuguese Overseas  (  Ultramar Português  )  , was one of the largest and longest-lived empires in world history and the first colonial empire of the Renaissance .

premise_source_doc_sentence: One of the largest empires in world history , stretching over three continents , the Russian Empire was surpassed in landmass only by the British and Mongol empires .

claim: The Portuguese Empire was one of the shortest-lived empires in world history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: World on the Move : The Portuguese in Africa , Asia , and America , 1415-1808  (  1992  )  explored the Portuguese Empire as the world 's first truly global empire , though one often overshadowed in the public imagination by the Spanish Empire ; Russell-Wood was intrigued by how the Portuguese made sense of their exposure to the once unimaginable vastness of the world , its people , languages , culture , flora , and fauna .

premise_source_doc_sentence: Written from prison , where he had no recourse to reference books or a library but his personal notes , Glimpses of World History contains the history of humankind from 6000 BC to the time of writing of the book .

premise_source_doc_sentence: Glimpses of World History , a book published by Jawaharlal Nehru in 1934 , is a panoramic sweep of the history of humankind .
